hero.hero.heading: I'm Bartosz
hero.hero.text: I create modern websites and web applications using React. I try to approach each project individually, so that the projects I make are the best as possible.

swiper.swiper.project.olx.description: OLX Clone is a web application project written in TypeScript with Next.js (React). Project contains home page, authentication, user panel, posting a new offer and offer view page.
swiper.swiper.project.blog.description: React Blog is a web application project written in TypeScript with React and Firebase. Project contains homepage, authentication, creating a new post and deleting created post and searchbar.

project-olx.project.olx.description: OLX Clone is a web application project written in TypeScript with Next.js (React). Project contains home page, authentication, user panel, posting a new offer and offer view page.

project-blog.project.blog.description: React Blog is a web application project written in TypeScript with React and Firebase. Project contains homepage, authentication, creating a new post and deleting created post and searchbar.

footer.footer.about-me: I create modern websites and web applications in React. I try to approach each project individually, so that the projects I make are the best as possible.
